'''''Minecraft: Greek Mythology (Original Soundtrack)''''' is the first soundtrack released for ''Minecraft'' by [[Gareth Coker]], which features music from the [[Resource Pack/Mash-up pack#Greek Mythology Edition|Greek Mythology Mash-up pack]]. Originally released as part of the July 24, 2015 update to Legacy Console Edition, the soundtrack was later released on December 21, 2016.
